column1: Little Goat Diner////Less impressed by the shrimp and grits
column2: particularly as compared to those at Carriage House the day prior
column3: but more than happy with the delicate pancakes
column5: and particularly the unique toad-in-a-hole-meets-fried-chicken-meets-gooseberries-meets-barbeque French Toast; a dish that much like the belly and brandade simply defies logic in turning out so well.
